headline.print_headline: Clutterbuck’s Late-Game Heroics Lift Islanders Again
headline.main: Clutterbuck’s Late-Game Heroics Lift Islanders Again

snippet: After tying the game in the third period, Cal Clutterbuck scored in the closing seconds of overtime to lift the Islanders over Carolina.
lead_paragraph: After tying the game in the third period, Cal Clutterbuck scored in the closing seconds of overtime to lift the Islanders over Carolina.
